info.name: occ_vac_test_04
info.description:
Same as occ_vac_test_03 except we are now testing multiple groups to make sure a message to one group does not effect other groups.

Also testing ceiling and floor values for the first fixture to ensure it is not effected by those values.

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
